product_name: ALPS Mountaineering Compression Stuff Sack - Medium - Special Buy
long_description: Whether you need a stuff sack for your sleeping bag or clothing items, the ALPS Mountaineering Compression Stuff Sack will help save space in your backpack time and time again, on all your treks. Straps connect the bottom and top lid so you can cinch down the top as much, or as little as you need to; adjust the length depending on what you are carrying on each trip. Constructed of tough ripstop nylon fabric; bottom handle for easy carrying. Zippered pocket on the top lid keeps small items separate and easy to get to. Special buy.
short_description: Whether you need a stuff sack for your sleeping bag or clothing items, the ALPS Mountaineering Compression Stuff Sack will help save space in your backpack time and time again, on all your treks.
